      • getType

        public final String getType()
        Type of the lens mapping. Supported values are gnomonical, stereographic, equidistant, equisolid_angle, orthographic, custom. For gnomonical (perspective) projection, it is recommended to specify a horizontal_fov of less than or equal to 90Â°

      • getScaleToHfov

        public final Boolean getScaleToHfov()
        If true the image will be scaled to fit horizontal FOV, otherwise it will be shown according to projection type parameters

      • getCustomFunction

        public final CustomFunction getCustomFunction()
        Definition of custom mapping function in a form of r=c1*f*fun(theta/c2 + c3). See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fisheye_lens#Mapping_function

      • getCutoffAngle

        public final Double getCutoffAngle()
        Everything outside of the specified angle will be hidden, 90Â° by default

      • getEnvTextureSize

        public final Long getEnvTextureSize()
        Resolution of the environment cube map used to draw the world

      • getIntrinsics

        public final Intrinsics getIntrinsics()
        Camera intrinsic parameters for setting a custom perspective projection matrix (cannot be used with WideAngleCamera since this class uses image stitching from 6 different cameras for achieving a wide field of view). The focal lengths can be computed using focal_length_in_pixels = (image_width_in_pixels * 0.5) / tan(field_of_view_in_degrees * 0.5 * PI/180)

      • setType

        public final void setType(String type)
        Type of the lens mapping. Supported values are gnomonical, stereographic, equidistant, equisolid_angle, orthographic, custom. For gnomonical (perspective) projection, it is recommended to specify a horizontal_fov of less than or equal to 90Â°

      • setScaleToHfov

        public final void setScaleToHfov(Boolean scaleToHfov)
        If true the image will be scaled to fit horizontal FOV, otherwise it will be shown according to projection type parameters

      • setCustomFunction

        public final void setCustomFunction(CustomFunction customFunction)
        Definition of custom mapping function in a form of r=c1*f*fun(theta/c2 + c3). See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fisheye_lens#Mapping_function

      • setCutoffAngle

        public final void setCutoffAngle(Double cutoffAngle)
        Everything outside of the specified angle will be hidden, 90Â° by default

      • setEnvTextureSize

        public final void setEnvTextureSize(Long envTextureSize)
        Resolution of the environment cube map used to draw the world

      • setIntrinsics

        public final void setIntrinsics(Intrinsics intrinsics)
        Camera intrinsic parameters for setting a custom perspective projection matrix (cannot be used with WideAngleCamera since this class uses image stitching from 6 different cameras for achieving a wide field of view). The focal lengths can be computed using focal_length_in_pixels = (image_width_in_pixels * 0.5) / tan(field_of_view_in_degrees * 0.5 * PI/180)

        public static final Lens.Builder builder()
